statement: Create an always-on reconnaissance layer that keeps Alt Production Hosting informed about emerging physical, social, and infrastructure threats.

objectives.title: Protect strategic infrastructure
objectives.detail: Track chatter that references datacenters, relay points, or hosting nodes tied to Alt Production Hosting.

objectives.title: Detect hostile coordination
objectives.detail: Surface clusters of actors who signal coordinated action across Telegram, dark web forums, or mainstream social media.

objectives.title: Maintain executive awareness
objectives.detail: Package every investigation with mission status, severity, confidence, and recommended actions so leadership can respond instantly.
